attributes.action: Bring back weekly collection of rubbish/recyclables now.
attributes.additional_details: I'm sick and tired of going forwards and backwards to the local recycling centre (tip) to get rid of my rubbish and recyclables after my bin has filled up before it gets collected. Two weeks is too long before the next collection. One week would be suitable. I have a 6 month old son that I have to take with me in the car that will get filled with rubbish which absolutely stinks. It's a wonder he hasn't caught anything as a result of this. It's past a joke.
